name: Colegio de Ingenieros de Caminos, Canales y Puertos
membership: Colegio is member of the Spanish Engineering Council, European Council of Civil Engineers, European Council of Engineering Chambers and the World Council of Civil Engineers and the World Water Council
goal:
The essential goals of the Colegio is the regulation of practice of the profession of chartcivil engineer , Canales y Puertos, the exclusive representative of the profession and to defend the professional interests of Chartered civil engineers.
Also, CICCP specifically aims to promote professional solidarity, contributing the progress of construction engineering, Canales y Puertos, promoting the skills of the profession and cooperate in the conservation of its historical legacy, all in a spirit of service to the society.
Promote and encourage the training of Chartered.
Ensure the highest level of employment for schools, working with the Administration and private enterprise to the extent necessary.
To report any proposed changes to the law on professional associations.
Report bills or provisions of any range that ran to the conditions on general professional duties, among which include the scope, requirements and the official titles
incompatibilities with other professions.
Participate in the councils and advisory bodies of government in matters of competence of the profession.
Adopt measures to prevent unqualified professional practice.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Sustainable competitiveness of the construction sector and its enterprises
Trans-European Transport Network (TEN-T)
Energy efficiency Initiatives
Public procurement directives
National applications of directives
Road Safety initiatives
Water Framework Directive and updates
